title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Analysis of steam power cycles: reheat and regeneration, combined cycle plants, cogeneration, boilers, different types of circulation, supercritical boilers. Down-comers and risers, drum and its internals, economizers and super-heaters, air pre-heater. Steam turbines, types, losses, condensers. air-extraction systems, feed water heaters, de-aerators. cooling towers. environmental pollution and its control. Basic concepts of reactor physics, types of reactors: BWR, PWR, PHWR, GCR and LMCR. Containment system, reactor safety and radiation shields, Waste management. Indian nuclear power programme. Hydel power: stream flow data and water-power estimate, hydraulic turbines: different types and their characteristics, guideline for selection, draft tube, penstock, cavitation; Plant layout, costing of water power, environmental impact.
